meanings.definition: The quality of being unable to be explained or understood.
meanings.sent1: The inexplicableness of the magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists were puzzled by the inexplicableness of the phenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The inexplicableness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an inexplicableness that drew him in.
meanings.sent5: The inexplicableness of the ancient ruins captured their imagination.

meanings.sent1: The inexplicableness of the decision left everyone confused.
meanings.sent2: She was frustrated by the inexplicableness of his behavior.
meanings.sent3: The inexplicableness of the cat's actions entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: His smile held an inexplicableness that intrigued her.
meanings.sent5: The inexplicableness of the painting made it unforgettable.
